programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Rapper’s Daughter Talks about Internet Trolls/ My Mom Says She Hates Me
programme.desc: Cori discusses her battle with Lupus, the vitriol spewed on social media and adversity she’s encountered.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: 5 Year Relationship…We’ve Never Met
programme.desc: Brietta reached out to the show to help her decide on whether to stay or not after finding Kertis cheating.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help Us Co-Parent
programme.desc: Ollie says he confessed to his wife Angel about cheating on her. Now Ollie wants to unlock Angel’s phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: She Came to Dad's Memorial Saying She's My Sister; Unlock the Phone: I Have a Confession
programme.desc: A woman believes that the woman who claims to be her sister fabricated documents to prove they both have the same father; a man says his girlfriend is cheating with random men, including his family members.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: You Cheated 12 Times; Best Friend Confession
programme.desc: Despite Marco's philandering ways, Jocelyn wants to make their relationship work; Auriel thought she could trust her best friend, London, until she caught her talking to her boyfriend, Money.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Truth: Who Stole The Money? / Update: I Fought My Identical Twin Sister
programme.desc: Di-Kinyan’s relationship with her brother, Starr, changed for the worse after he allegedly stole money from the family business. See what happens to this brother and sister, plus an update you don’t want to miss on today’s Karamo!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Twin Sent Dad To Jail
programme.desc: Ronquan and his twin brother Rashard have been in and out of foster care since they were young kids.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: We Are A Throuple In Trouble / Unlock My Sex Worker Girlfriend’s Phone
programme.desc: Key and Jenna were dating for a year before inviting another woman named Kayla to the mix.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Did My Mom Trade Me for Drugs? Part 1
programme.desc: Lex is about to meet her mother for the first time. Lex wants to know why she was abandoned as a child.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Fought My Identical Twin Sister; DNA Mystery: Dad, Stop Ghosting Me
programme.desc: After years of pain and anger, Brianna says, her mother, Rosemary, attempted to stab her and run over her with a car; Loni doesn't approve of his video vixen girlfriend Shanice's attire and says he can't trust her around men.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Teen Daughter Having An Affair With the Man I Love?
programme.desc: John’s wife Ingrid says there’s no reason to own 3 cell phones unless he’s using them to cheat! Tina’s fiancé is already married to another woman, but did he cheat with a neighbor too? Is Lisa’s boyfriend cheating on her with her teen daughter?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Can't Make Girls... Your Daughter Isn't Mine!
programme.desc: Mickiela and Ardis both claim that Donavan fathered their kids. Then, Alicia says that her ex Tommy fathered her son, but he’s here with his girlfriend Brandi to prove her wrong! Will Maury say “You ARE” the father?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Was in a Coma ... I Can't Be Your Baby's Father
programme.desc: James was shot and needed help, Mireya took care of his every need and nursed him back to health. Now, James denies Mireya's baby and claims he was in a coma when Mireya got pregnant.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 1 Mom ... 2 Men ... 3 Babies. Who's the Dad
programme.desc: The moms on today's show are sick and tired of their men denying their children. They say they're more than 100% sure that these men are the father of their kids.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Family Secrets Exposed...I Cheated Over 150 Times!
programme.desc: On this episode we'll meet some guests that have shocking relationships secrets to reveal. But could one guest really have cheated over one hundred times? The shocking truth will leave you speechless. But will these relationships ever be able to recover once the secrets are revealed?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Husband Cheating with my Sister ... Again?
programme.desc: Is Tamara's husband having an affair with her sister? And how far will he go to keep it secret? Then, did Amanda's husband cheat on her while she was battling cancer? Plus, Chelsea is worried that her husband is cheating on her with women at work.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: These Teen Girls Are Wrong ... Their Babies Are Not Mine!
programme.desc: Best friends discover their children have the same dad, born weeks apart. Dad denies paternity, citing odds of lightning striking. Jonathan and his father reject fatherhood of another child.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Got My Wife's Sister Pregnant!
programme.desc: Is La'Nell a grandma if her sister-in-law slept with her son? After 17 tests who fathered Sholonda's baby?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I've Tested 5 Men...Will I Find My Kids' Father Today?
programme.desc: Cedric wants to walk down the aisle with Deidra, but wants to know if their twins are actually his! Then, Dooger is engaged to Maryanne, but has been denying their 3 children due to her sister Lisa’s meddling!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Too Much Sex And Fighting, Teen Girls Confronted!
programme.desc: These teen girls are wild, disrespectful and completely out of control. They're mothers are here because they say they have nowhere else to go and they don't know who else to turn to. But these girls are in for a surprise.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Husband or His Brother My Baby's Father
programme.desc: Josh overcame so much to be a father. But now he's about to find out if the miracle child that he's called his own, belongs to another man! Then, not only does Marcus deny that he's Nyeema's babies father, but she caught him in bed with her sister!

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Stripping an Investor
programme.desc: Mirabel Diaz says she’s known the defendant, Toni, for 10 years because she was an exotic dancer at her adult entertainment business. She ended up investing in the defendant’s online adult toy website and it’s been almost two years and hasn’t been paid back her initial investment, nor her profits. Toni says Mirabel knew full well the return on her investment could take anywhere from 1-3 years and is just getting antsy. Toni is accused of stripping an investor.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Cruise Catastrophe
programme.desc: Crystal sues her ex-friend Claudia for $800, claiming she used her cruise payment for another guest after Crystal canceled due to her son’s accident. Claudia countersues for $1,000, alleging harassment and car damage.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Sketchy Rental Situation
programme.desc: Charles Louis sues Carnel Scott for $1,359, claiming he was evicted from an illegal rooming house with 13 residents, including criminals and drug users. Carnel defends his legal operation, accusing Charles of being disruptive and violent.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Bleached My Designer Bag
programme.desc: Erica Hinton sues Bethania Rincon for $900, claiming bleach spilled on her expensive MCM bag at a salon. Bethania argues the damage was from oil stains and cleaning spray after Erica placed food on the bag.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Rear-End Ruckus
programme.desc: Ehab sues for $5,000, claiming Melissa and Forest rear-ended his car, causing injuries and damage. The defendants counter, alleging Ehab braked suddenly, causing the crash. They deny wrongdoing and file a $2,300 counterclaim for bumper repairs.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: I Call That Abandonment
programme.desc: Donna says the defendants stored their old beat up RV on her property and they owe her money.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: Are You My Sister?/ Update: My Husband Has A Gambling Addiction
programme.desc: Ivory never knew who her father was and sadly never got to meet him before his passing.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Our Love Went Viral
programme.desc: Trevor and his wife are no strangers to reality television. But Trevor says she's taken things too far.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: To See Your Grandson...Stop Bullying Me
programme.desc: Anissa says Nate rescued her from an untenable situation and more importantly believes he is her father.
